message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $22,000. I'm confident this will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $18,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I'm motivated to sell, $18,000 is significantly below its true value. Could you meet me halfway at $20,000?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $19,000 for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that.
